recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
recipes.quick_steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season salmon with salt, pepper, and paprika. Grill for 4-5 minutes per side. Toss broccoli and carrots in olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast in oven at 425°F (220°C) for 15-20 minutes.

recipes.name: Chicken Fajitas 2
recipes.quick_steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned, about 5-6 minutes. Add bell peppers and onions and cook until tender. Serve with tortillas, shredded cheese, and your favorite toppings.

recipes.name: Creamy Tomato Pasta
recipes.quick_steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions. In a separate saucepan, combine canned tomatoes and heavy cream. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. Stir in parmesan cheese until melted. Combine cooked pasta and tomato sauce.
